TopReViews.Title: New place for Rou Vegie
TopReViews.Comment:
New branch of Rou Vegie and it's located in District 5. It's much bigger and more beautiful than the 1st one in District 1. This branch is near my office place and I will come here more often in the future.
The menu is thicker and nicer, prices are same as the 1st branch I think. There are more choices for customers here 
Services from staffs are quite okay and they are helpful. Foods are delicious especially Malay fried rice and Kimchee fried rice. 
There is one thing that we have to wait for long time for crispiest fried tofu to be served (after we've finished other foods).
